name: io.github.michelemarri/agentshelf
description: Put docs on the shelf. Your agent knows where to look. Local-first, offline, instant.

tools.name: get_docs
tools.description: Search documentation for a specific installed library by topic. Use when you know which library to query.

tools.name: search_all
tools.description: Search across ALL installed documentation packages for a topic. Use when you don't know which library has the answer, or when a topic may span multiple libraries.
